username_changes_description: We've made improvements to the referral system. If your username has changed, don't worry: your previous referrals remain intact and your new referral code is now your current username.
support_help: Your support helps us continue improving the platform
thanks_support: Thank you for supporting the TRIBO VAULT project!
reward_message: You will be rewarded with great care from the TRIBO team always üòéü§ù
footer_text: The best way to stake your CDT
how_works_desc: Tribo Vault allows you to earn daily rewards based on the amount of CDT tokens you have in your wallet.
earn_daily: Earn 0.1% daily by staking your CDT tokens
choose_name: To continue, choose your Triber name. This will be your permanent identifier on the platform and you won't be able to change it later.
benefit1: Earn 0.1% daily on your CDT balance
benefit2: No lock-up period - your tokens are always available

referral_contest_description: Top referrers will share a prize pool of 10,000 CDT!
join_referral_contest: Join our referral contest and win up to 5,000 CDT!

country_required: Selecting a country is required to continue
welcome_gift_description: Thanks for joining Tribo Vault. Claim your 1 CDT welcome gift!
select_country_description: Help us improve your experience by selecting your country. This allows us to personalize content and connect you with other users from your region.
mission_text: TRIBO was born with the goal of revolutionizing digital finance by empowering individuals through innovative blockchain solutions. We believe in an ecosystem where the community is at the center, promoting financial inclusion and creating opportunities for all.
cdt_description:
CDT (Crypto Digital Tribe) is the native token of our ecosystem. More than just a cryptocurrency, CDT represents belonging to our community and access to exclusive benefits:

‚Ä¢ Participation in project governance
‚Ä¢ Access to premium platform features
‚Ä¢ Rewards for staking and active participation
‚Ä¢ Future access to exclusive NFT collections
roadmap_intro: TRIBO is constantly evolving. Learn about our upcoming milestones and join us on this journey.
community_text: We are more than a blockchain project, we are a global community united by shared values. Connect with us and be part of this revolution.
contract_upgrade: We are working on the V3 contract redeploy, which will give us total independence and improve the security and functionality of the CDT token. This important milestone is scheduled for late May/early June 2025.
invest_future: Invest in the future of community digital finance
ecosystem_development: Ecosystem development for users and creators
full_roadmap_description: Check out our detailed roadmaps on our official website
transparency_desc: We operate with full transparency in every aspect of our project.
sustainability_desc: We build a sustainable financial ecosystem for the long term.
community_desc: We prioritize the growth and well-being of our community.
telegram_desc: Join our official channel for news and updates
twitter_desc: Follow us to stay up to date with all the news
discord_desc: Be part of our most active community
join_thousands: Join thousands of people who are already part of TRIBO
market_expansion: Expansion to new markets and blockchain ecosystems
join_earn_daily: Join TRIBO and start generating daily returns with your CDT investment.
country_ranking_description: See which countries have the most CDT staked and users
staking_levels_description: Discover the different staking levels and their benefits
access_special_discord: Access to special Discord roles and channels
exclusive_legend_benefits: Exclusive legendary benefits and early access
coming_soon_boost: Coming soon: boost your earnings by up to
more_cdt: more CDT to reach next level
tribers_lore: Tribers are the foundation of our community. These early adopters believe in the potential of CDT and are taking their first steps in the TRIBO ecosystem. With their basic staking, they contribute to the stability and growth of the network.
cryptotribers_lore: Cryptotribers have demonstrated their commitment to the TRIBO vision. With a deeper understanding of the ecosystem, they enjoy enhanced rewards and begin to access exclusive community features. Their increased stake strengthens the entire network.
millotribers_lore: Millotribers are the pillars of the TRIBO community. These dedicated members have shown substantial commitment and enjoy premium benefits. Their significant stake helps drive innovation and expansion of the ecosystem.
legendarytribers_lore: Legendarytribers represent the elite of the TRIBO ecosystem. These visionaries have made an extraordinary commitment to the project's success. Their massive stake provides them with the highest rewards and exclusive benefits that shape the future of TRIBO.
